text: The Tri-Valley Conference is a school sports league within the Michigan High School Athletic Association (MHSAA), located in the Saginaw and Midland areas of Michigan, United States. ==Member schools== ===Current members=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Team !Location !Enrollment !Class !Joined !Previous conference |- !
